mapper.insert: insert into ec_sim_cust_rule (rule_id, channel, judge_condition, judge_desc, similar_percent, priority, use_flag) values (#{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judgeCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judgeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{similarPercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ec_sim_cust_rule set channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, judge_condition = #{judgeCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, judge_desc = #{judgeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, similar_percent = #{similarPercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_flag = #{useFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select rule_id, channel, judge_condition, judge_desc, similar_percent, priority, use_flag from ec_sim_cust_rule where rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by similar_percent desc
select rule_id, channel, judge_condition, judge_desc, similar_percent, priority, use_flag from ec_sim_cust_rule order by similar_percent desc
